content.description: On the right side of the block start low in a nice horizontal.  Power up and left to a nice sloper/crimp.  Continue up and over the bulge on slopers to the finish.  Down climb the back.
content.location: Located on the "Early Manhood" block on the western end of "Tortuga's" main rock formation.

content.description: On the left side of the block start down low in a nice horizontal crimp rail.  Power up with your left and work the scooped arete as high as you can.  Then get your feet up and toss for the sloping finish.  Down climb the back of the block.  Short up sweet.  The moves are quite good and are worth a burn!!
content.location: Located on the "Early Manhood" block on the western end of "Tortuga's" main rock formation.

content.description:
Start low on good one pad crimps as if you were starting "

Early Manhood

" with your feet out left.  Move to the right and slap around the corner.  From there, you have a big move up to good holds.  Don't top out!  Another big move out right to the corner sloper.  Traverse to the right under the upper boulder using good sharp holds with bad feet.  Top out to the right in the shadows with good holds and feet.
content.location:
This is on the "Early Manhood Block".

Downclimb the back.
